trans-unit.source: Exception occurs if Azure storage container name is specified incorrectly.
trans-unit.target: Exception occurs if Azure storage container name is specified incorrectly.

trans-unit.source: This exception occurs if the Azure storage container name is specified incorrectly.
trans-unit.target: This exception occurs if the Azure storage container name is specified incorrectly.

trans-unit.source: You will receive this error if you have not specified both the container and the blob (file) name using <ui>the Path to blob beginning with container</ui> option when writing to Azure Blob Storage.
trans-unit.target: You will receive this error if you have not specified both the container and the blob (file) name using <ui>the Path to blob beginning with container</ui> option when writing to Azure Blob Storage.

trans-unit.source: Revisit the <link xlink:href="7a391181-b6a7-4ad4-b82d-e419c0d6522c" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Writer</link> module and verify that the specified path to the blob contains both the container and the file name, in the format <userInputLocalizable>container/filename</userInputLocalizable>.
trans-unit.target: Revisit the <link xlink:href="7a391181-b6a7-4ad4-b82d-e419c0d6522c" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Writer</link> module and verify that the specified path to the blob contains both the container and the file name, in the format <userInputLocalizable>container/filename</userInputLocalizable>.

trans-unit.source: The Azure storage container name is incorrect.
trans-unit.target: The Azure storage container name is incorrect.

trans-unit.source: The Azure storage container name "{0}" is incorrect; a container name of the format container/blob was expected.
trans-unit.target: The Azure storage container name "{0}" is incorrect; a container name of the format container/blob was expected.
